segments.text: The kitchen feels so ordinary with the cabinets and counters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that overflowing sink makes me worry about a big slip-up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading down, soaking everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, completely unaware of the danger right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddleâ€” one wrong step and she'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy on the stool, stretching so high for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That thing looks like it's going to give way any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting patiently, but this could end badly for both.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, cookies everywhere, and maybe a broken arm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems safe, but inside it's a hazard zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness is heartbreaking to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor kids, just wanting a treat, but risking so much.
segments.speaker: PAR
